Trader Eeso:
Welcome to the very heart of magic - to the Ivory Tower!
Nowadays people think about the Ivory Tower as about some kind of a research center in the first place. But once it was a powerful political fraction and had the whole continent under its control. How do you think, where all the knowledge is storaged? Right here, in the Tower!
When we have to face a global crisis, here in the Ivory Tower we can always find the solution and maybe even find out what was the reason.
